alert.note: Alert for Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 9:59PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Val Verde County through 1045 PM CDT... At 958 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amistad Village, or 13 miles west of Del Rio, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake View, Amistad Village, Black Brush Point, Diablo East, Governors Landing, Long Point, Devils Shores, Pafford Crossing, 277 South Boat Ramp, San Pedro Canyon, 277 North Campground, Rough Canyon Recreation Area, Spur 406 Campground, Rock Quarry Campground, Salem Point, Lake Ridge Ranch and Devils River State Nat Area Big Satan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
